name: Permafrost Elemental
movement: walking at 20 feet and burrowing at 30 feet
description: The Permafrost Elemental is a large creature associated with cold and ice, possessing a formidable presence in battle and severe cold damage abilities.
memorable: Its ability to infect nearby creatures with a deadly disease upon taking fire damage makes it a grave threat.
goals: To engage in combat and dominate foes with cold and disease effects.
relations: Can be encountered with other elementals or cold-themed creatures.
environment: Typically found in cold, icy terrains.
strengths: Immunity to numerous conditions like paralysis and poison, and has strong physical might.
attacks: Can perform a Multiattack with two Slam attacks, inflicting both bludgeoning and cold damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Plague-Ridden Pound can knock creatures prone as well as inflict a potent disease.
senses: Possesses both darkvision and tremorsense, allowing it to detect creatures in darkness and through solid ground.
skills: Has average perception skills with a +2 modifier.
additional_information: Earth Glide ability allows it to burrow without disrupting surroundings.
The Frigid Footprints ability creates difficult terrain around it.
It does not require air, food, drink, or sleep.
Can spread the primordial plague disease when taking fire damage.
Resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing attacks.
test_queries: large ice elemental with disease capabilities
creature that freezes ground and hampers movement
cold elemental that infects with diseases
monstrous ice creature with strong melee attacks
elemental that burrows and creates difficult terrain
